thread.title: Body found in Willamette River near Fremont Bridge
thread.title_full: Body found in Willamette River near Fremont Bridge | OregonLive.com

author: Tony Hernandez | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: Body found in Willamette River near Fremont Bridge
text:
The Multnomah County Sheriff's Office has begun investigating the death of a man whose body was found Friday afternoon floating in the Willamette River between the Fremont and Broadway bridges, an agency spokesman said.
Nearby constructions crews saw the body of a man and called for assistance around 2:45 p.m., Lt. Steve Alexander said. River patrol units and Portland Fire Bureau crews responded 10 minutes later and found the body mid-channel, he said.
"Detectives and the medical examiner were notified and responded," Alexander said. The sheriff's office will handle the investigation and turn over the body to the Multnomah County Medical Examiner's Office, he said.
No other information is currently available. The man's identification should be released after his family is notified of the death.
-- Tony Hernandez
